abstract: In the first television ad of his campaign, Gov. Rick Perry of Texas promises to create at least 2.5 million jobs as president, in part by loosening regulations on oil drilling and other energy exploration.
snippet: In the first television ad of his campaign, Gov. Rick Perry of Texas promises to create at least 2.5 million jobs as president, in part by loosening regulations on oil drilling and other energy exploration.

headline.main: Perry's First TV Ad Focuses on Jobs
